=== Project 01: Al-Jazari ===

'''''info'''''
* '''Project Page''': https://launchpad.net/al-jazari
* '''Launchpad Entry''': https://blueprints.launchpad.net/al-jazari/+spec/main-features
* '''Registered''':  * '''Contributors''': <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:ubuntu-eg-devs|UbeuntuEG Dev team]]</nowiki>
* '''Packages affected''': 

=== Feature Summary ===
<nowiki>[[File:al-jazari_main.png|DRAFT|width=500]]</nowiki>

Collecting&imagining main features and design. This includes: 
* General
** Release 1.0 should have Arabic
** Project can be turned into a project group in order to implement it into many languages.
* Designing the UI
** Features on main area
** Course space
*** Ability to embed text courses
*** Ability to embed video courses
*** Ability to embed video courses from on-line resources
*** Ability to embed slides
*** Ability to embed sonic casts to be played during text or slide course shows
*** Trigger-able actions on user activity(like view some vid, then wait for the user to make some action, then play the next vid, etc)
** Coding space
*** Code highlighting
*** on-screen information on each element of written code
** Features on Panes
** Features on Menus
** Features on Settings and preferences
* Designing the core
** Ability to save and retrieve user info and status
** Features on Hooks
** Features on Code handling
** Internally compile/interpret code, run and return the output in the same window
** Features on Levels and Trophies
** Features on Socializing Accomplishments
* Designing the server-side
** Ability to save users' info and statuses
** Course Gallery.

=== Rationale ===

The Geeky community needs a real practical Programming Master
